html:
2.15.22  7:22 pm   You planning on moving planets anytime soon?

     Been living on Callisto since '17, pretty chill out here.
2.15.22  7:14 pm   Your song "i'm scared" sounds like a cry for help to me, please tell me it's not.

2.15.22  6:53 pm   Really good things have been happening to me recently (including the release of i'm scared, I love it!) but whenever good things happen I'm just anticipating the awful things that are bound to happen.

     Do you experience this?

If so, how do you deal with it?
2.15.22  6:49 pm   If I go back in time to stop bad things from happening, do I stop myself from stopping the bad things because they didn't happen so I didn't go?
2.15.22  6:28 pm   whats so scary about today or tomorrow?
2.15.22  6:24 pm   do the lyrics of your song have meaning?
2.15.22  6:10 pm   would you do a song in another language?
2.15.22  6:09 pm   how can i learn to break patterns better? your songs flow so well without an apparent chorus / verse structure.
2.15.22  5:58 pm   have you ever dreamt of making videos

2.15.22  5:43 pm   i think you're really good at writing dialogue (the chair conversation in "here comes the sun", the play with the iphone power brick and the mechanical pencil). why don't you do more of it?
2.15.22  5:42 pm   do you have any scenes in a project that you like but didn't end up using?

2.15.22  5:36 pm   i love your new song and the video that accompanies it. you are so talented not just at video/music making, but also capturing the nuances of human emotions. your work has brought me so much joy, and my life is much fuller because of you and what you create. thank you.

     when did you start and complete this song,

      and were there specific feelings/events that inspired the tone of it?
2.15.22  5:34 pm   Why are turtles afraid of heights?
2.15.22  5:32 pm   Do you have any tips on how to stay in that early-stage creative mood when the deadline for a project is coming up fast?
2.15.22  5:30 pm   this is really random but you seem like you can do a really good donald trump impression
2.15.22  5:28 pm   why are you scared

2.15.22  5:18 pm   Would you say reading and answering thousands of Q&A questions over the years has helped you grow or gain insight in something?

      Also, loved i'm scared! It somehow came out at a time when I could relate to it more than ever before.
2.15.22  5:15 pm   What's your favorite video that you made?
2.15.22  5:09 pm   In your song "i'm scared" you said you were scared. How true is this, though?
2.15.22  4:51 pm   best substance to apply to bread?
2.15.22  4:33 pm   will everything be ok?
2.15.22  4:12 pm   Are you still scared?
2.15.22  4:09 pm   What's a question you wish someone would ask you?
2.15.22  4:07 pm   is it possible to predict the past?
2.15.22  3:48 pm   Advice to someone who is mostly self taught but wants to improve but can't afford higher learning for music but really wants to improve
2.15.22  3:46 pm   how do you feel about grass?
2.15.22  3:42 pm   favorite music scale?

2.15.22  3:41 pm   Two questions, if that's ok.

1. On i'm scared 0:56, is the 'i'm scared' a C# C A G# G F G#?

      Or is it something quarter-toney?

     And how does the harmony work? (i realize this is 3 questions, but it's really just 1, still i apologize)

     2. How do you count the 'i'm scared' at the end when you mod from A to Eb via Bb? I'm feeling some weird groupings with triplets, but i'm scared.

this

     ok thanks Bill. hope you're not too scared and mostly well
2.15.22  3:40 pm   do you think you will ever make an album?

2.15.22  3:35 pm   Can you name a few of your most favorite songs that you posted online?

      can you also explain why?
2.15.22  3:30 pm   what are you scared of most
2.15.22  3:25 pm   are you sma rt
2.15.22  3:22 pm   what is your most feared predatory animal?
2.15.22  3:22 pm   Is the world a place?
2.15.22  3:18 pm   How long had I'm scared been written?

2.15.22  3:15 pm   how do you get your ideas?

      they just like shower thoughts?
2.15.22  3:03 pm   what are you scared of?

2.15.22  1:39 pm   Have you thought of doing a collab?

     if so, with who?
2.15.22  1:31 pm   whats the deal with airline food
2.15.22  1:26 pm   favorite meme? (Or just a meme you like a lot)
2.15.22  1:09 pm   Any plans to edit more reality videos at some point?
2.15.22  1:00 pm   Are you going to make more improv songs
2.15.22  11:17 am   does the title of your next song contain the letter i?
2.15.22  10:22 am   What's the sequel to "hi, im Steve?

2.15.22  9:49 am   i heard somewhere that in order to be great at something, you need to sacrifice your other hobby/likes.

     i mean, it makes sense but it is really hard, especially when you're attached to it. i love filmmaking, but I don't think I can give up other things. but I also think it will be shit if i didn't focus enough. idk, man. what do you think i should do. there must be something, right?
2.15.22  8:38 am   holy cow bill your new song is coming out today!!!!!!
2.15.22  7:19 am   Please say something that motivates anyone that is reading this (I need it)
2.15.22  7:18 am   will you serenade me with a new song ( with video ) ?

2.15.22  4:24 am   in "hallelujah", at 1:59 the horse starts crying... is this because the 4 chord in the song has now changed to a minor iv which sounds more melancholy and sad? because those are the feelings i associate with that chord

     also, it would be cool if you wrote more songs around that chord (or the b6 of the major scale in a similar context i think, i'm not very good at music theory)
2.15.22  2:07 am   how to slow down time ?
